org.apache.hadoop.hbase.snapshot

类 RestoreSnapshotHelper.RestoreMetaChanges

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.snapshot.RestoreSnapshotHelper.RestoreMetaChanges
  • 封闭类:
    RestoreSnapshotHelper

    public static class RestoreSnapshotHelper.RestoreMetaChanges
extends Object
    Describe the set of operations needed to update hbase:meta after restore.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器和说明

    • 方法详细资料

      • getTableDescriptor

        public TableDescriptor getTableDescriptor()

      • getParentToChildrenPairMap

        public Map<String,Pair<String,String>> getParentToChildrenPairMap()
        Returns the map of parent-children_pair.
        返回:
        the map

      • hasRegionsToAdd

        public boolean hasRegionsToAdd()
        返回:
        true if there're new regions

      • getRegionsToAdd

        public List<RegionInfo> getRegionsToAdd()
        Returns the list of new regions added during the on-disk restore. The caller is responsible to add the regions to META. e.g MetaTableAccessor.addRegionsToMeta(...)
        返回:
        the list of regions to add to META

      • hasRegionsToRestore

        public boolean hasRegionsToRestore()
        返回:
        true if there're regions to restore

      • getRegionsToRestore

        public List<RegionInfo> getRegionsToRestore()
        Returns the list of 'restored regions' during the on-disk restore. The caller is responsible to add the regions to hbase:meta if not present.
        返回:
        the list of regions restored

      • hasRegionsToRemove

        public boolean hasRegionsToRemove()
        返回:
        true if there're regions to remove

      • getRegionsToRemove

        public List<RegionInfo> getRegionsToRemove()
        Returns the list of regions removed during the on-disk restore. The caller is responsible to remove the regions from META. e.g. MetaTableAccessor.deleteRegions(...)
        返回:
        the list of regions to remove from META

      • updateMetaParentRegions

        public void updateMetaParentRegions(Connection connection,
                                    List<RegionInfo> regionInfos)
                             throws IOException
        抛出:
        IOException
